    • 會 [ huì ] to assemble, to meet; meeting; association, group
鱠魚 [ kuài yú ]: Chinese herring (Ilisha elongata)

鱠字的基本解释

鱠
kuài
见“鲙”。

鱠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》古外切，去泰，見。］
“鲙1”的繁体字。
(1)鱼名。参见“鱠魚”。
(2)同“膾”。切得很细的鱼或肉。
(3)同“膾”。把鱼、肉切成薄片。

鱠字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱠； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1479第02
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?古外切，音膾。細切肉也。【干祿字書】膾通鱠。又【博物志】吳王江行食魚膾，棄殘餘於水，化爲魚，名膾殘，卽今銀魚。

kuài

Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" ancient outside cut, go to Thailand, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "鲙1".
(1) The name of the fish. See "breastfish".
(2) Same as "脍". Finely sliced fish or meat.
(3) Same as "脍". Cut the fish and meat into thin slices.
Scorpion
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲙; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1479 No. 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Ancient outer cut, sound 脍. Finely cut the meat too. 【The Book of Dry Lu Words】Tong Tong 鲙. Also【Natural History】Wu Wangjiang travels to eat fish, discard the remnants in the water, and turn into fish, the name is remnant, and today's whitebait.
